markup_sections.core_documents:
## Core documents

* [Terms of reference (PDF, 143
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/aeg_wembley_arena_terms_of_reference_oft_formatted.pdf) (25.03.13)
* Inquiry Group:  [Martin
  Cave](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/about-us/members/reporting-panel-members/martin-cave)
  (Chairman of the group), [Roger
  Finbow](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/about-us/members/reporting-panel-members/roger-finbow),  [Anthony
  Stern](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/about-us/members/reporting-panel-members/anthony-stern) and [Andrew
  Popham](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/about-us/members/reporting-panel-members/andrew-popham) 
* [Administrative timetable (PDF, 24
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/aeg_wembley_administrative_timetable_housestyled.pdf)
* [Disclosures of interest (PDF, 28
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/aeg_wembley_disclosure_of_interest.pdf)
* [Issues statement (PDF, 54
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130507_aeg_wembley_issue_statement.pdf) (07.05.13)
* [Varied terms of reference (PDF, 145
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130529_aeg_wembley_arena_varied_terms_of_reference.pdf) (29.05.13)
* [Notice of provisional findings (PDF, 34
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130723_notice_of_pfs.pdf) (23.07.13) 
* [Summary of provisional findings report (PDF, 122
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130723_summary_noexcisions.pdf) (23.07.13)
* [Provisional findings report (PDF, 474
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130724_provisional_findings_excised.pdf) and [Appendices
  and Glossary (PDF, 1.0
  Mb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130724_provisional_findings_appendices_and_glossary.pdf)
  (24.07.13)
* [Final report (PDF, 490
  Kb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130902_final_report_excised.pdf) and [Appendices
  and Glossary (PDF, 1.0
  Mb)](http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/assets/competitioncommission/docs/2013/aeg-wembley-arena/130902_appendices_and_glossary.pdf)
  (02.09.13)
